item_category: The Galaxy A series introduces the Galaxy A51, with advanced camera technology including a 48MP Rear Camera and its quad-camera system. The Ultra Wide Camera lets you capture more in every photo and Super Steady allows you to shoot super-smooth video action without the blur. Watch it all back on the super-sleek and stunningly curved Super AMOLED Infinity-O Display, which makes using apps and watching video a whole new experience. And, it comes with Google.
